nodes.text: Disney Emoji Blitz is a 2016 mobile game published by Disney Consumer Products and Interactive Media. Star Wars-themed expansions were released in 2017 and 2018.

Ready. Set. Blitz! Collect and play with 1500+ Disney, Pixar and Star Wars emojis like never before in an exciting matching game! Play fast paced rounds of match-3 to earn prizes, complete missions, and share your collected emojis through the Emoji Blitz keyboard!
